name: monaco-mermaid
description: Monaco language and theme support for mermaidJS

scripts.build: tsc index.ts --lib es2019,dom --downlevelIteration && mv index.js browser.js && tsc index.ts --lib es2019,dom --target es6 --downlevelIteration --moduleResolution node
scripts.dev: npm run build && watch -p ./index.ts -p ./package.json -c "npm run build"

author: Yash Singh
